text: "Stop the Rock" is a 1999 song by Apollo 440 and is the leading single from their third studio album Gettin' High on Your Own Supply. It went to number 10 in the United Kingdom, number 9 in Scotland, number 26 in Ireland, number 79 in Australia and number 17 in Spain. It was their breakthrough single for the band. == References == Category:1999 songs
title: Stop the Rock
